conversationHistory.userMessage: What's a quick meal plan for tomorrow with 300 BDT budget?
conversationHistory.botResponse:
Hello! Here's a budget meal plan for you.

• Lunch: Chicken Biryani (approx. 250 BDT) - a single serving is filling and provides protein and carbs.

• Cheaper Alternative: Egg and Vegetable Khichuri (approx. 150 BDT) - equally nutritious and budget-friendly.

Shopping Tip: Buy vegetables from local markets for better prices.

Next step: Plan to cook the Biryani and see if you have enough money for the rest of the week.
